metadata.summary: Artifact Collection ingests and indexes diverse file types (logs, PCAPs, executables) from sensors or REST API for searchable security investigation
metadata.primary_use_case: Collect, retain, and search various artifact types (logs, network captures, system files) for tactical investigation during security operations

extracted_apis.description: Manually ingest an artifact file from a host with LC sensor installed
List available network interfaces for PCAP capture on Linux sensors
